## What is SnappWord?

SnappWord (æˆªè©) is a LINE Bot for language learners. Users send a screenshot from any learning app or reading material, and AI (Google Gemini) analyzes the image to extract vocabulary words. Each word becomes a structured flashcard with: word, pronunciation, translation, context sentence with translation, and an AI-generated example sentence. Cards are delivered as LINE Flex Messages and stored in a personal dashboard.

## How It Works

1. **Screenshot** â€” Take a screenshot in any app (Duolingo, Netflix subtitles, articles, textbooks, etc.)
2. **Send to LINE** â€” Send the screenshot to the SnappWord LINE Bot
3. **AI Analysis** â€” Google Gemini multimodal AI extracts vocabulary in ~7 seconds
4. **Receive Cards** â€” Get beautiful flashcards directly in LINE chat

## FAQ

**Q: What screenshots work?**
A: Any screenshot containing text in a supported language â€” Duolingo lessons, Netflix subtitles, YouTube captions, news articles, textbook pages, social media posts, etc.

**Q: Is it free?**
A: Yes, the Seed plan is free forever with 30 screenshots per month.

**Q: How fast is it?**
A: AI analysis typically completes in about 7 seconds.

**Q: How do I start?**
A: Add @snappword as a friend on LINE and send your first screenshot.

**Q: Can I export my vocabulary?**
A: Yes, paid plans support CSV and Anki deck export from the dashboard.

**Q: What about my data privacy?**
A: Screenshots are processed by Google Gemini AI and stored encrypted in Supabase. Screenshots are deleted after 30 days. See full privacy policy at snappword.com/privacy.
